name: Spooky Manor
description:
+++ Our new game 'THE MAGIC CASTLE' is available now! +++

A long lost relative of yours has recently died and you have been named in the will. To claim your mysterious inheritance you must visit the family home of 'Spooky Manor' - your inheritance awaits you in the attic of the haunted house...

'Spooky Manor' is a classic point and click adventure game. Explore the manor, find and use objects, solve puzzles and rid the house of its ghostly inhabitants!

'Spooky Manor' game trailer on Youtube:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=69rEBegQoYo

FEATURES:
+ A classic point & click adventure game.
+ Charming hand-illustrated imagery.
+ Atmospheric sound effects and music.
+ Many items to collect and puzzles to solve.
+ Game auto-saves as you progress.


Don't forget to checkout these other great adventure games from Digi-Chain Games:
* Mystery Lighthouse
* Cool Quest
* Dungeon of the Damned
